"Fighter": "Fighter is a class that tailors its moves to whatever situation it finds itself in to deal high damage."

"Each PA can be fluidly connected to another attack action if timed properly, allowing you to respond flexibly to any combat scenario.
It may take some getting used to, but once you master switching up your fighting style to counter whatever enemies you face, you will be able to deal top-tier damage."

"\"Limit Break\" is an Active Skill that boosts both damage dealt and damage taken for a set time when activated.

Using it comes with a great deal of risk, but if you use it at the right time, such as when your enemy is Downed, you will be able to reap the rewards."
